ValidationRule.description: If the contact is being created by Support staff, please check the box "Support Case Related" in order to distinguish if the contact was created by Support or not.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS( Owner.Profile.Name , 'Support'), Support_Case_Related__c = False, OR(ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISNEW()))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check the box "Support Case Related" within the contact if you are creating the Contact and belong to the Support Group. "Support Case Related" field cannot stay unchecked before proceeding.
